DOC.brief_summary: Human animal study demonstrate xylooligosaccharides ( XOS ) highly efficacious prebiotic ingredient delivers benefit minimum level 1.4 g/day ( ) , much low level require fructooligosaccharides ( FOS , 5 g/d ) galactooligosaccharides ( GOS , 8 g/d ) . XOS promote gastrointestinal regularity relieve diarrhea constipation 0.7 g/d 1.4 g/d , respectively . Xylooligosaccharides may also reduce blood cholesterol may improve glycemic control , although data clinical trial need confirm preliminary finding .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Xylooligosarcharide Composition Human Colonic Microflora
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 2050 year age screen . 2 . In generally good health 3 . Subjects must read sign Institutional Review Boardapproved write informed consent prior initiation study specific procedure enrollment . A subject exclude condition might compromise ability give truly informed consent . 1 . Any history gastrointestinal disease except appendectomy 2 . No antibiotic , pre probiotic laxative use 2 month study . 3 . Any subject history diabetes mellitus , serious medical condition , chronic hepatic renal disease , bleed disorder , congestive heart disease , chronic diarrhea disorder , myocardial infarction , coronary artery bypass graft , angioplasty within 6 month prior screen , current diagnosis uncontrolled hypertension ( define systolic BP > 160mmHg , diastolic BP > 95mmHg ) , active chronic gastrointestinal disorder , bulimia , anorexia , endocrine disease ( except thyroid disease require medication ) indicate medical history routine physical examination . 4 . Any subject screening laboratory value outside laboratory normal range consider clinically significant study participation investigator . 5 . Any subject currently use tobacco product . 6 . Any subject pregnant lactating , become pregnant study . 7 . Any subject unable unwilling comply study protocol .
